Projects

A collection of projects I have worked on

Super Starkiller 3000

SUPER STARKILLER 3000 is a 2D action / bullet hell game made in Javascript using Phaser.

Drone Control

My senior project at University of Houston Clear Lake, built with the help of Team Flight. It is a 3D quadcopter flight simulator and control platform, built in Java and Javascript with LibGDX and Node.js.

Pac Dan

Pac Dan is a true-to-the-original clone of the arcade classic Pacman made using Java and LibGDX
